Philosophy & Approach
"Intelligence without architecture is noise. I build the scaffolding for machines to think with purpose."

Forward-thinking Technology Leader dedicated to leading Data and AI Modernization journeys for global enterprises. Adept at bridging the gap between legacy data debt and AI-first architectures, ensuring high-quality data readiness for GenAI integration.

Skilled in establishing AI Centers of Excellence (CoE) that leverage MLOps to reduce time-to-market for autonomous agents, ensuring transparency, security, and human-centric AI adoption. Architecting systems that don't merely automate—they reason, adapt, and orchestrate at scale.

Kidz-Clinic / MedFlow EMR
2024 — Present

"Eliminating administrative burden while achieving zero compliance failures in a multi-clinic EMR ecosystem with 2,500+ patient records."

Architected a Unified Knowledge Mesh using LangGraph orchestration and LoRA fine-tuned models. Deployed multi-agent CrewAI system for automated scheduling, clinical note extraction, and real-time PII detection. Achieved full HIPAA compliance through automated audit trails.

StockSteward AI
2023 — Present

"Engineering a real-time market intelligence platform capable of multi-source ingestion and autonomous trading agent coordination across NSE/BSE."

Designed a unified knowledge mesh for real-time market data ingestion over NeonDB and Supabase high-concurrency streams. Built an Agentic Trading Guardian coordinating Sentiment, Technical, and News agents via a centralised Brain using LangChain. Achieved 99.9% uptime at production scale.
